title: Landscapes, cultures and technologies of loneliness: A call for participatory research with young adults
content:
Publication date: December 2024

Source: Public Health, Volume 237

Author(s): Mare Knibbe, Youssef Azghari, Arjan van Beelen, Lotte van den Berg, Fouzya Besteman, Kitty Jurrius, Sander van Lanen, Klasien Horstman
